name: The Region Of Orange Mandarin
description: If you're looking for a unique trip far away from other tourists where you experience the life of local people ,this is a tour I would like to recommend to you  .  It takes almost 3 hours on the bus from Ho Chi Minh city to my hometown where is famous about Lai Vung orange mandarin ,  Nem Chua Lai Vung ( pork was rolled in banana leaf ) ,tropical fruit plantations spread of skyline and other traditional trade villages . You will go through the orchard garden and enjoy the fresh fruits till you feel full and wherever you go you will be welcome by the friendly smile from the local people .
